description: Not sure why use this broswer over firefox? Im sure it has a use case someone likes, such as a miniumlist broswer. other than that is obviously lacks features, probally the point of it tbh. Although I don't find it useful im sure someone will!

App idea is good. But a lot of sites will either not support it or have limited features. If it were possible to use Gecko or even Chromium/Blink instead of WebkitGTK, it would have been a worthy app.
Simple and very useful.. It works for me.
im trying to play web games on it dosnot wor
Great idea but the renderer is Webkit, as opposed to something more robust like Gecko, so many web apps fail to load correctly.

The app has a rambox-like concept, but executes it much better. You're not locked down to the apps that the app developer chose, you just type in the website and add it. Plus, tangram is a native app so it runs much faster with less resources.
It's super well integrated with default Gnome and it's really fast and pretty frugal on resources.
Simple, native GTK, fast.
This could be an interesting app, but as it's using webkitgtk it's hobbled by the power trips of some random Gnome developer.
Can't use some functions on websites like the camera because of the engine it uses (webkit). Other than that, it's a good program.
It's super slow and just doesn't work with many of the web apps I use. On top of that, it doesn't respect my system theme. Uninstalled.
summary: Slow, doesn't work with my apps

description: Doesn't work properly on Debian 11
The app can be open but the url search/open doesnt work.
I really enjoy using it, but since last update the whatsapp web and reddit freezes sometimes. I don't know if it is a webkit problem, but as it will be updated soon, I'm anxiously waiting for it.
summary: Works pretty well, but last update frezzes

description:
Just opens window, but no tabs available.
Fedora 35 x86_64, X11, Gnome 41.5, Intel i7-3770, Proprietary GTX660Ti
It does not load.
was it supossed to do something ? or it's a feature ?

I'm running the flatpak version of 1.4 and it's buggy as hell. It freezes every 30 minutes and I have to shut it down and reboot it. I hope they get this program working well because I love the idea of it.
Dead simple to create wrappers for web apps such as my encrypted, private email client

Unfortunately, I can't use Microsoft Teams for school with it since it doesn't support screensharing and, as other reviews mention it, camera. Guess I gotta stick to proprietary stuff like Rambox for now.

I tried this back on F35 with Gnome 41 and experienced the same, trying again on F36 with Gnome 42 and the perormance is the same. 

I love the idea of a GTK Native, open source replacement for Rambox (electron based), but I've three things I'd love to see:


1. Performance on-par with electron. 
2. Dark mode support.
3. Larger icons; even with no text labels on tabs, the current inteface looks very like a web browser and doesn't make my web-apps feel like apps. 

Even with great performance, the interface still feels very like a web browser rather than a collection of desktop apps (that happen to be web pages). Rambox (v2) is a good comparison, pages are presented as apps, the tabs are more like icons in a dock. 

I'm happy this application's in development, I'll be keeping a close eye on it.
summary: F36 - Gnome 42: Resizing the window / general use seems very slow

description: I can't sign in with a third party account. Shame :(
summary: Can't Sign in with third party account

description: not super bad!

I used it every day, works very well for basic web apps.
I liked it for internet radio stations, better interface than most internet radio players.
Doesn't work anymore with fresh Fedora 37 install. Can't open any website, maybe I can't find webkit anymore.
Chromium would be a nice imporvement over webkit anyway.
summary: Liked it a lot, doesn't work for me anymore sinds Fedora 37

description: I love this concept so much, but right now it isn't at its peak. It's very buggy, with minimal settings (I immediately noticed the lack of an adblocker), but I really love the mission behind this project and I look forward to its success. For now? I'll be using Gnome Web
It allow us to have our most used webapps in one place. Unfortunetly, does not work with spotify or tidal web players, as far as I have tested. But is a great app anyways.
Using Flatpak with fedora 37 no media playback on every website
This is what I was looking for a while but it lacks most basic but most important fetaure an adblock also dark mode for sites would be great. Would use if it had adblock
How should I use it? There is no tab grouping, so this is just a laggy browser with pages previews instead of regular tab bar. Tab grouping will be killer-feature, but for now app is unusable
Thank you for your effort.

I like gnome-style minimalism but that's no excuse to remove the most basic setting. The concept and utility of Tangram is good, but the removal of the sidebar is too far.
If you want the sidebar, you can't add it with a browser extension. So it has to be a setting provided.

And yes, like others, I've noticed it's a bit slower than my Firefox.

Managing the web apps with this program is easy to use. Very useful for dividing cookies and keeping data separately with different boxes with one app. Theres a little bugs in the app, as when a notification comes from an app (Whatsapp, et cetera..) the sound will be repeated again & again. Little annoying, but you can fi it with a simple restarting app. I am giving 3 stars to this app
crashes whenever i close a tab. pls fix that

Webdienste in einer App starten, verschiedene Profile gleichzeitig, ist sehr hilfreich. Was mir noch fehlt, ist die Möglichkeit, innerhalb der einzelnen Instanz zurück zu gehen, wie in einem Browser. Ansonsten jedoch äusserst hilfreich.

I previously tried to have multiple Chrome profiles for this purpose, wich can lead to a mess tbh. This is really, really useful and I give it a spin - for now it fits my needs (and there is a back button now @Othmar).
Es una aplicacion interesante, pero en lo particular me consume demasiada memoria ram comparado con el navegador web.
summary: Aplicacion interesante, pero consume muchos recurso

description: Сама концепция неплоха, и работает явно лучше webapps из минта, но памяти жрет... телега + вацап + слак и треть от 8 гигов как корова слизала. Три самостоятельных приложения занимают в полтора раза меньше оперативки
不能够创建.desktop快捷方式
